import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-user', templateUrl: './add-user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-user.component.scss'] }) export class AddUserComponent { onSubmit() { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } router: any; AddUserForm: any; cancel() { this.AddUserForm.reset(); this.router.navigate(['./add-user']); } }
